column4: hi guys. how do I find out at what frequency my processor is running? cat /proc/cpuinfo says "cpu MHz         : 1600.000", dmesg says "Detected 2992.697 MHz processor."
it's actually a Intel Core 2 Quad (Q6600)
sounds like your processor temporarily underclocked itself to 1600 MHz due to low load; it will go back to 3000 or so if you load it up
Random832 : MeanEYE : I am wondering if cpuinfo detects overclocking correctly
